summary: Instrumental Christmas music.  Replaces music in towns, taverns, some fields, etc.
descriptionHtml:
Instrumental Christmas music replacer.  Replaces some music in towns, taverns, fields, etc.

Another late posting, sorry.  It took forever to upload.  I had planned to tweak it, but I ran out of time.
Maybe I'll get around to it later.

This mod has a plugin and music files.

Changelog:
Optional Version1: Added optional file with some tweaks to the main file.
Removes combat music and dungeon music changes.  Requires main file.  
Drop it into your main file and overwrite when asked.

Version2:  Added more songs, with a focus on guitar, bells, and piano.
Rearranged and removed a few songs to better blend with Skyrim.

Install:
Choose version 2.  You can extract directly into your data folder, or use a mod manager to install.

If you are updating:
You can extract version 2 directly into your previous folder and overwrite, or use a mod manager and all it to overwrite.


Samples of music can be listened to at the following website:
http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free/index.html?genre=Holiday
https://www.jamendo.com/en/list/a56082/christmas-bells


updating...
